categoriesExplanation:
The workout is categorized under 'Indoor Rowing' with a high score (0.9) because the title explicitly states 'Cardio Surge Row,' indicating a rowing workout. Furthermore, the description mentions 'endurance intervals' and 'low rhythms,' which are typical of rowing, particularly on an ergometer.
